name: Loaded Sweet Potato Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: large sweet potato, black beans, broccoli, corn, guacamole, tomato, fresh cilantro
recipeIngredient: ¾ cups black beans, drained and rinsed
recipeInstructionSteps: Pierce air sweet potato with a fork and microwave on high for 9-12 minutes until fully cooked.
Top with black beans, broccoli, corn, guacamole, tomatoes, and cilantro.
